How to have joinable thread in KAAPI

This example shows how to create thread and to use synchronization objects in order to implement new kind of thread with 'join()' method to wait for result. This is a weak semantics with assumptions commented in the code.

Compilation

The example show how to use the Util::Object in order to group both Util::Mutex and Util::Condition objects to be used for Util::CriticalGuard construction or for waiting/signaling on event. Simply enter in your build directory examples: 

      > make thread_join

Running

      > ./thread_join

that produces something like: 

      Main thread wait result
      JoinableThread being to sleep

and 5seconds after: 

      JoinableThread is wakeup
      Result is:9.86902

Sources
